video_prompt: A luminous, golden energy vortex at the center swirls and subtly pulses. Dynamic glowing tendrils radiate outwards, constantly weaving and intertwining. Beaded strands gently undulate, with golden light droplets flowing along their paths. Metallic spheres slowly drift and subtly rotate, their reflective surfaces catching and shifting pulsating golden highlights and cool blue reflections. Nebulous wisps of smoke-like energy softly drift and swirl in the deep background, while faint points of light gently twinkle and shift. The entire cosmic network pulses with evolving, interconnected energy.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, ranging from more descriptive to highly concise:

**Option 1 (Detailed & Comprehensive):**
"Highly detailed, hyperrealistic abstract cosmic digital art, depicting intricate interconnectedness. A luminous, off-center spherical energy core, a swirling golden vortex with a dark void center. Radiating intricate golden glowing tendrils and undulating beaded strands form a dense, sparkling network. Scattered dark metallic (silver/bronze) reflective spheres with sharp golden highlights and subtle cool blue reflections, some out of focus. Deep cosmic void background with subtle nebulous grey/blue wisps and faint sparkling stars. Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, intense golden glow, ethereal."

**Option 2 (Balanced & Concise):**
"Abstract cosmic digital art: a luminous, off-center spherical golden energy core, swirling vortex, dark void center. Intricate radiating golden glowing tendrils and beaded strands form a sparkling network. Scattered dark metallic reflective spheres (silver/bronze) with sharp golden highlights and cool blue reflections, some out of focus. Deep cosmic void background with subtle grey/blue wisps and faint stars. Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, intense golden glow, hyperrealistic, ethereal."

**Option 3 (Very Concise - for models that handle brevity well):**
"Highly detailed abstract cosmic energy core: swirling golden vortex with dark center, radiating intricate glowing tendrils and beaded strands. Scattered metallic (silver/bronze) reflective spheres with golden highlights, some out of focus. Deep cosmic void background, subtle nebulous wisps, faint stars. Dramatic chiaroscuro golden light, hyperrealistic."
